item.title: Meet the real screen addicts: the elderly
Euro cops take down cybercrime network with 49M fake accounts
item.description:
Home News Technology Security Euro cops take down cybercrime network with 49 million fake accounts By Juha Saarinen Oct 21 2025 11:43AM Collaboration between Europol and the Shadowserver Foundation. 4 million), with an additional â‚¬420,000 ($693,000) lost in Latvia. Share it with us anonymously here.

item.title: That Time Ken Thompson Wrote a Backdoor into the C Compiler
item.description:
2 Stage I: Self-Reproducing Programs In this stage, Thompson describes a self-reproducing program (also known as a "quine"3). The key insight is that a program can contain its own source code as data, which it then prints along with the code to print it. In C, you can write string literals with escape sequences: "Hello world\n" The compiler needs to know what character code \n represents.

Read more

item.title: The Goon Squad
item.description:
They posted photos of their gooncaves to Reddit. These were porn shrines. They showed you where the people went.

Read more
